statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY MM.SortOrder, MM.Name, MM.ID) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, #ChannelID# as ChannelID , MM.Code as SettingCode , MM.Name as SettingName , AA.SettingValue as SettingValue
FROM IKBase.dbo.TCode MM WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TChannelSetting AA WITH (NOLOCK) ON MM.Code = AA.SettingCode AND AA.ChannelID = #ChannelID# WHERE MM.ParentCode = 'ChannelSetting' AND MM.UseYn = 'Y' ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM dbo.TChannelSetting AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
SELECT * FROM dbo.TChannelSetting AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ChannelID = #ChannelID# AND AA.SettingCode = #SettingCode#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TChannelSetting ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, ChannelID, SettingCode, SettingValue ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #ChannelID#, #SettingCode#, #SettingValue# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TChannelSetting SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, ChannelID = #ChannelID# , SettingCode = #SettingCode# , SettingValue = #SettingValue# WHERE ID = #ID#
